'''Margha''' is a Dutch woman who appeared in "[[The One With The Football]]". [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] and [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] both fight for her. She eventually "chooses" Chandler, but after his gloating, decides that he is "shallow... and a dork".
